# backgroundEffect

**Instance Property**

The blur effect to apply to the bar’s background.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundEffect: UIBlurEffect? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The blur effect provides the base layer for the bar’s appearance, and it determines how much of the underlying content is visible. UIKit applies the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarAppearance/backgroundColor] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarAppearance/backgroundImage] on top of this effect.

## Configuring the background appearance

- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the bar.
- **backgroundImage**: The image to display on top of the bar’s background color.
- **backgroundImageContentMode**: The content mode to use when displaying the bar’s background image.
